field.label: Description
field.help: Short description to identify this TLS-config

field.label: CA-certificate
field.help: The CA certificate file used to verify the peers certificate.

field.label: This server's certificate
field.help: The server certificate this proxy will use. The file may also contain a certificate chain.

field.label: Policy OIDs
field.help: Require the peers certificate to adhere to the policy specified by this oid / these oids.

field.label: CRL-Check
field.help: Enable checking peer certificate against the CRL (default off). Note that radsecproxy does not fetch the CRLs itslef. This has to be done separately, e.g. with fetch-crl.

field.label: Cache Expiry (seconds)
field.help: Specify how many seconds the CA and CRL information should be cached. By default, the CA and CRL are loaded at startup and cached indefinetely. This option may be set to zero to disable caching.
